name: @subsocial/data-hub-sdk
description: SDK for communication with Social DataHub service

scripts.build:dev: rm -rf dist && tsup src/index.ts --format cjs,esm,iife --dts --minify && rm -rf ../data-hub-squid/src/dev-dependecies/data-hub-sdk/* && cp -r ./dist/ ../data-hub-squid/src/dev-dependecies/data-hub-sdk
